column1: As Cromwell aptly said : ‘ Put your trust in God, if you so wish — but keep your powder dry.’

column1: They are very soluble, hence the admonition to ‘ keep your powder dry’ and why bonfire ash is very quickly spoiled if allowed to become damp with rain.
